page.title: 02Leiston Primary School
page.content: Leiston Primary School was built in 1953. The ages of the children are 4 to 9.There are 333 children including nursery class.These are in 12 classes with 13 teachers.There are 2 big playgrounds and 2 big fields.Every classroom has got a wash basin,a door going outside and a large stock cupboard. We come to school at 9am and leave at 330pm.Most classes do Maths and English in the morning and creative work in the afternoon.We also do P.E,music,games and swimming.In the school there are lots of books,true books and story books and there are sticker books too,these have different colours on them to show how difficult they are to read. We have 3 terms and 2 short holidays and 1 long one in the summer.
